longBusinessSummary: DCM Nouvelle Limited engages in the manufacturing and sale of cotton yarn in India, Bangladesh, China, Eqypt, and internationally. It operates through two segments, Textiles and Chemicals. The company offers better cotton initiative, organic, and slub yarns. It provides its products under PRIMERO, DINERO, CCY, and FUTURO brand names. The company also offers specialty chemicals, such as benzylamine and dibenzylamine. DCM Nouvelle Limited was founded in 1991 and is based in New Delhi, India.
